ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron nodded. I am well aware of Cyngar. For now we must see where it goes. Keep that third eye on him and let me know of any bad intentions he may have.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron nodded. "I am well aware of Cyngar. For now we must see where it 
goes. Keep that third eye on him and let me know of any bad intentions he may 
have." He turned to the computer and started making battle scamatics for the 
next battle. He loved being a war general. It was his best feature. All his 
plans were brilliant. It was the only thing that made him truly happy.

--part1_186.af6f8a6.2a69859b_boundary
